## EditorPluginProps.renderIntoToolbar() method

Allows the plugin to render buttons into the toolbar

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
renderIntoToolbar(children: React.ReactNode): React.ReactNode;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                         | Description       |
| --------- | ---------------------------- | ----------------- |
| children  | <code>React.ReactNode</code> | buttons to render |

<b>Returns:</b>

`React.ReactNode`
